resources.string: Please sign in with Evercam before add a camera into your Evercam account.

1. If UPnP is enabled on your router, \'UPnP Forwarding\' helps forward your camera without log into the router.\n\n2. If you\'ve forworded the camera in your router, \'Manual Forwarding\' helps fill up forwarded ports and make it easier to add to Evercam.
Send a feedback to let us know this is a camera or not.
Add a discovered camera to your Evercam account with on click.
Are you sure you want to sign out?
